thread.title: 'Mindy Project' Star Xosha Roquemore Pregnant, Expecting First Child With 'Get Out' Actor Lakeith Stanfield
thread.title_full: 'Mindy Project' Star Xosha Roquemore Pregnant, Expecting First Child With 'Get Out' Actor Lakeith Stanfield

title: 'Mindy Project' Star Xosha Roquemore Pregnant, Expecting First Child With 'Get Out' Actor Lakeith Stanfield
text:
A post shared by @xoshroq on Mar 8, 2017 at 9:58pm PST 
Congratulations are in order! Xosha Roquemore announced on Instagram on Wednesday, March 8, that she is pregnant and expecting her first child with her boyfriend, Get Out actor Lakeith Stanfield . Cutest Celebrity Baby Announcements 
"I am WOMBMAN. #internationalwomensday," the Mindy Project actress, 32, captioned three photos of herself cradling her baby bump. In two of the shots, she bares her belly in a black Calvin Klein bra and panties, keeping warm in a massive fur coat. In the third selfie, she dons a form-fitting red dress. Lakeith Stanfield and Xosha Roquemore on January 10, 2016. Frazer Harrison/Getty Images 
Though this is the first time Roquemore — who plays nurse Tamra Webb on the sitcom — has publicly confirmed her pregnancy, she subtly hinted at the news in January when she showed off a tiny bump on the red carpet at the Sundance Film Festival. In February, she caused fans to speculate again when she cradled a more noticeable bump while wearing a form-fitting minidress at the 2017 Essence Black Women in Hollywood Awards. Xosha Roquemore at Essence Black Women in Hollywood Awards on February 23, 2017. Leon Bennett/Getty Images for Essence Celebrity Babies 2016 
The Precious actress has since continued to drop hints on Instagram. Days before baring her baby bump on the social media app, she shared a throwback photo of her toned belly. "Hashtag I miss my abs," she captioned the mirror selfie. A post shared by @xoshroq on Mar 4, 2017 at 11:16am PST 
Roquemore and the Atlanta actor, 25, made their red carpet debut at the premiere of his movie Straight Outta Compton in August 2015. It is unclear when they began dating. Just Like Us: Celebrity Moms 
The couple's announcement comes one month after Jordan Peele , the mastermind behind Get Out , and his wife, Chelsea Peretti , revealed that they're also expecting their first child . "Beyonce schmonce," the Brooklyn Nine-Nine actress, 38, wrote on Instagram just days after the pop icon shared that she and husband Jay Z are expecting twins .
